amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 116-366 to direct the EPA to investigate methods to prevent contamination by GenX of surface waters, including source waters used for drinking water purposes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 116-366 to direct the EPA to investigate methods to prevent contamination by GenX of surface waters, including source waters used for drinking water purposes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hudson amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Hudson.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hudson amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
